website_summaries.verdict: Ergonomic hooks make working on large projects significantly easier.
pros: Set includes crochet hooks, scissors, stitch markers, measuring tape, and more
Soft 3-piece case keeps kit well organized and comes in a variety of fun patterns
Crochet hooks are lightweight with a plush rubber grip that is comfortable to hold for long hours
cons: Scissors are not quite strong enough to cut through all yarn

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is an awesome kit to get started with
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an awesome kit to get started with. The grips on the hooks are quite comfortable, and I love that there's space for the hooks I already owned. The little stitch markers are not the highest quality, but most of them work well. Some of the molding is still present, so I don't use some of them as they would snag the yarn with their rough unfinished-ness. The scissors are not good, and I'm not sure why there are some knitting tools included. But overall, the case is a great way to store items, and the handles make long sessions comfortable. The stitch counters, measuring tape, and durable case make this a worth while purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fields

customer_reviews.title: great storage for on the go or home.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. It is very compact and easy to carry in my purse when I take my projects with me. I loved all the items so much, I ordered more of the stitch markers, another of the scissors, and since my two year old granddaughter appropriated my tape measure I'll be replacing that too. In the back compartment I added my aluminum hooks. The set of ergonomic hook alone are worth the price alone.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Fairly nice case
customer_reviews.text: I like having a place to organize all the little things you need while crocheting. The case is sturdy, and the zippers are good quality. I don't like that the little pouches for each crochet hook are different sizes, but don't decrease incrementally. It's just sort of random. The hooks that are included are a little rough, and the sizes are just sort of stamped into the rubber handles. I have to hold it right up to a light bulb, and keep turning it to see the size. They definitely aren't an asset in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Mind WandererTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit my most used and bigger crochet hooks in the second side that had holders! it was able to fit my 11mm crochet hook. I have everything that came with this set and then some in this bag, and it was still able to close! I have everything in the set plus three pens, and 11 more crochet hooks, I'm really loving this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginners Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good case for a beginner! That’s what I was when I bought this. I had to buy new hooks once I became a better crochet...er. The rubbery stuff on the handles began to slip off after a lot of use. I still use, and love, the case. It protected my hooks and was still useable after hurricane Michael ripped the roof off the house and it sat in a puddle of rainwater for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for beginners.  Room to add your favorite hooks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kit for a beginner like me. I have found that I prefer Susan Bates Silvalume hooks, but the ones included in this kit are ok. They’re sturdy and ergonomic, I just don’t love the hook part as much as Silvalume, but to each their own. I use the stitch markers, measuring tape, darning needles, and scissors all the time, and my Susan Bates hooks fit nicely when bunched together. (If I place them in the pouches individually, they are too loose and they fall out.) This pouch also fits a couple of my chunky yarn hooks (size L-N, not pictured.) I’m glad I purchased this, it’s well made, and I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: After searching high, low, and all over, I finally found the perfect crochet case. I actually had a set of ergonomic hooks just like these, but bought this case anyway. It holds ALL my hooks - the ergonomics, my old metal hooks, my tiny steel hooks, plus all the accessories you could need. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great hooks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the amount of hooks and accessories you receive. I found I crocheted tighter than I did with normal aluminum hooks but adjusted to the change in tension. The hook is very comfortable in my hand, I use a knife grip when I crochet and my hand was cramping a lot with regular hooks. I tried the flat clover hooks but found them uncomfortable to hold, not an issue with these.
customer_reviews.author: GeekFamily96

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of storage!!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this set!! I crochet and needed a case that could hold not just one set of hooks but other hooks as well. This case has room for another 10 hooks! The hooks it comes with are all labeled in mm. There are 9 hooks: 2.0mm , 2.5mm , 3.0mm, 3.5mm, 4.0mm, 4.5mm, 5.0mm, 5.5mm, and 6.0mm. It came with everything pictured in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Agar

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of metal crochet hooks and wanted to find a case to hold them all and I saw this and loved it! Not only did it come with a set of hooks with the grip, but it had more space to hold my other hooks as well! I also loved the fact that it came with scissors and markers. Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Kfarrington

customer_reviews.title: Case only
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this twice and each time I only receive the case. I was very excited about this item and ended up very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: A great crochet hook set, good for beginners or advanced crochet enthusiasts. I love how comfortable the ergonomic handles are in my hand. I feel that just the crochet hooks are well worth what I paid, so all the other items are a welcomed bonus! The hooks, zippered carry pouch, and stitch markers are my favorites about this set. But all of the items are so helpful. :)
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Crochet Kit
customer_reviews.text: The grip on these hooks are very comfortable. Nice kit to carry with your crochet bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great for crochet beginners and experts!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so many people have asked me about it! I have begun crocheing again after many years, in part for charity, and I love the hooks themselves. I had always used the aluminum ones, the handle on these is great on the hand. It is also very pretty and a small size, perfect for taking it around places, and all the other 'notions' that it comes with are useful.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly as represented with accessories and hooks
customer_reviews.text: This kit is exactly as it is represente on Amazon. It arrived promptly and all zippers and compartments are functional. The crochet hooks have a nice grip and there’s plenty of room to store hooks in other compartment. Cover motif is cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: The case alone is worth this price...
customer_reviews.text: Great little set! I've made several small projects since I received it, and I am very happy with it. The hooks are very comfortable, slide quickly and smoothly, and the case is fantastic! (I would have spent this much on just the case.) The little accessories are plastic and are things you may already have, but hey-- they're just an added bonus. (The thread/yarn clipper is great!) I wouldn't hesitate to get this for anyone who enjoys crochet.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Holds all I need
customer_reviews.text: Great pouch with lots of pockets. Holds a lot of items. I have all of my hooks, stitch markers, scissors, tape measure, needles all neatly packet in this purse. Easy to throw into my yarn bag and head out the door with everything I need. Seems to be very durable too. So glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Girard

customer_reviews.title: Handy little storage case
customer_reviews.text: The organizer is great to hold all my crochet gear. The hooks are decent quality. Comfortable to hold, and I like how the numbers are stamped into the handle instead of simply printed in ink. There are no letters though, only the millimeters. The other accessories are pretty cheap, specifically the scissors. They stopped cutting after about 10 snips. I already owned better quality items so I just swapped them out. I really just ordered this for the folder, so I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Delivered quickly. I haven't used everything that came with it but all of the items are what they seem to be in the description. I like the hooks but after years of using normal ones it's taking some getting used to. LOVE the case!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality carrier for all my crochet hooks. I like that it came full of supplies, even though I had hooks already. I always need a spare and the price was right. I love that everything I need is conveniently together now in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Stork

customer_reviews.title: The hook sizes do not match
customer_reviews.text: Part of why i ordered this was because it showed the D hook was a 3.25mm hook. The order came with a 3.00mm D hook and a 3.50mm E hook. So I'm still down a 3.25mm ergonomic hook which is why i odered this in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Only goes up to 6.0 mm
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set for beginners. Was disappointed that’s the size I needed wasn’t in this set. I should have just ordered the one size I needed . Check your pattern before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crochet set!
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer plastic hooks to metal. They grip better. I have designed crochet for 60 years. This is an excellent set. Very good value. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: DIAMOND

customer_reviews.title: Grateful
customer_reviews.text: I got a phone call when my daughter received these items and there were a group of ladies caring on, you'd thought it was Christmas. Very pleased; thank you
customer_reviews.author: Judi Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners or travel set
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and got this set to try crochet out. I'm a few projects in and haven't had any issues. They're pretty comfortable, I will be upgrading at some point but to get a feel for whether or not you might like to crochet these are great. Super cute bag, I use the accessories a lot, especially the little safety pins.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: Good stufd
customer_reviews.text: Love the case and what comes with it, except for the hooks. I just don’t like the hooks that came with it, but you can add your own so it isn’t that big of a deal. Good for if you’re just starting with the hobby.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap products
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it will be an awesome deal the crochet needles are very extremely cheaply made and there’s no markings on him telling you the size I think this product is overpriced and I’m not pleased . Go to Wallmark to get an item like this you get a better quality product altogether for cheaper price .
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em. What a difference using these vs the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. What a difference using these vs the regular hooks. The only negative I can find so far is that the hook sizes or in mm vs using letters. I still haven't made the connection and can see where it might be a problem with new crocheters, especially when the patterns us letters to id hook size.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delighted and it was just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted and it was just as pictured. The crochet hooks are very comfortable and easy to use, and the kitty case has everything that you see pictured. It arrived quickly and I highly recommend this product to anyone who loves to crochet!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Row counter came semi-broken
customer_reviews.text: The set is nice for the money you spend on it, the only weird part was that the row counter came messed up, it looks like two of the same side got clipped into the counter so one side is right side up numbers, the other is upside down numbers. It's not a big deal for me personally as I just keep track with an app, but seemed notable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Yarn does not glide smoothly and the handles get sticky and weird
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described, did not feel low quality at all. Can also make a great gift. I'm very happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Nice crochet hook case
customer_reviews.text: This case was exactly what I needed and is super cute. The items it came with are nice , the quality of the case is nice and it has so much room for my hooks and other items , isn't bulky, and is easy to grab and take with me. Very glad I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: amanda albers

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m kinda of disappointed because this little bag is so cute & exactly what I was looking for but, the zipper is not completely attached at one end & the bottom pouch is half sewn shut.....

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this kit. Hooks were nice to use and the case is cute.

customer_reviews.title: Great crochet set!

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you'de need

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such great value! It contains so many useful items. I take it with me everywhere I go!

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Ergonomically Priced
customer_reviews.text: Very good set for if you're lazy, like me, and don't want to spend the time or money purchasing everything individually and then finding a case to fit everything. Only issue I found was that the stich counter that came with my set is a little tight and hard to move the dials. The one in my friend's kit, though, was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! This is perfect for organizing your crochet supplies. The hooks are very comfortable to use and the scissors and loop savers work great. I have no complaints with this kit and use it on a daily basis! I highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Kit has all you need to get started
customer_reviews.text: I'm a yarn working beginner, just learning abut crocheting and knitting, so I wanted a kit where I'd get what I needed to get started. This is perfect!

customer_reviews.title: I’m really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I love having everything in one little case.

customer_reviews.title: So cute I can’t even!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute I don’t even know where to begin! Comes with everything you need! Great quality. Only thing I would note is the hooks only come with the mm on them and not the letter.

customer_reviews.title: Well organized and fits my purpose very well. I ...

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it shows

The case is alright, as are the other accessories, but you can’t actually used the stitch counter because it doesn’t fit the needle. Will be returning for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome

customer_reviews.title: This is an EXCELLENT product!

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money. Pay attention to the hook size, as they are smaller than I expected - though there is space in the other zipper size to add other hooks.

product_meta.title: Teamoy Crochet Hooks Set - 9 Pieces Ergonomic Crochet Hooks with Case and Crochet Accessories, Perfect for Arthritic Hands, Colorful Dots
feature_bullets: The crochet hooks set includes 9 x Crochet Hooks B - J (2.0 - 6.0mm), 20 x stitch Markers, 1 x Row Counter, 9pcs Plastic Knitting Needles, 2 x Aluminum Stitch Holders, 1x Scissors, 1x Retractable Measuring Tape, 1 Gauge Measure Ruler, 1x Crochet Hook Case.

ERGONOMIC CROCHET HOOKS: Long crochet hook with soft rubber grip handles are enough smooth and have no rough edges, the hook throat is deep enough to catch the yarn, without snagging yarn. Perfect for Arthritic Hands.
This crochet hook case is made of nice quality canvas coated material, the double layer design to store your more crochet tools. zipper closure can let the case open up all the way flat.

All-in-one crochet kit keep everything your crochet accessories and supplies stay organized, never lose anything again. Perfect for travel or crocheting everywhere, like the airport, a park, home or work.

CROCHET STARTER KIT: This crochet kit set is an ideal perfect gift for Mom, Wife, Experienced Crocheters, Knitting Enthusiasts or a new Knitter Beginner on Christmas, Mother's Day, Birthday or many occasions.
